name: SI.RT.ET
description:
Game done for the Brackeys Game Jam 4.

The game attacks the theme rewind in all of it's aesthetics and mechanics. It's a rewind to the beginning of the game industry.

 You have to rewind a complete Tetris board, removing the pieces from to top till the bottom, just draw the pieces based on the ones will have available at your left. Tip: you can rotate your pieces on the left clicking on them

Follow me on www.twitter.com/biosuco
